unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!**
normalised: social media and influencer marketing follower analytics get a desi twist

unnormalised: Mumbai: Ever wondered if all those followers are *actually* seeing your aunties' Diwali recipe videos or if those "likes" on Rohan's travel pics from Leh are legit? New follower analytics tools are now focusing on hyper-local trends.
normalised: Mumbai ever wondered if all those followers are actually seeing your aunties Diwali recipe videos or if those likes on Rohan's travel pics from Leh are legit New follower analytics tools are now focusing on hyper local trends

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIT-Delhi, with his team, just launched "FollowerScope," a platform digging deeper than just numbers. Think analysing sentiment towards brands in regional languages like Tamil or Bengali. It even tracks fake follower ratios *per city*, identifying bots boosting accounts of aspiring Bollywood influencers.
normalised: doctor Sharma from I I T Delhi with his team just launched FollowerScope a platform digging deeper than just numbers Think analysing sentiment towards brands in regional languages like Tamil or Bengali It even tracks fake follower ratios per city identifying bots boosting accounts of aspiring Bollywood influencers

unnormalised: Early adopters are seeing conversion rates jump by up to 20% in some campaigns. No more wasting Rs. 5 lakhs on influencers whose engagement is as fake as a pani puri vendor's promises! This helps marketers target real audiences in areas like, say, a 5 km radius in Chembur, Mumbai. This new tool gives insights in real-time, and for just Rs. 1500 a month, you can transform that 200 sq ft office space into your influencer campaign command center!
normalised: Early adopters are seeing conversion rates jump by up to twenty percent in some campaigns No more wasting rupee five lakhs on influencers whose engagement is as fake as a pani puri vendors promises This helps marketers target real audiences in areas like say a five kilometer radius in Chembur Mumbai This new tool gives insights in real time and for just rupee one thousand five hundred a month you can transform that two hundred square feet office space into your influencer campaign command center
